scripts.dev: bash -c 'npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend'
scripts.dev:backend:mock: cd backend && DISABLE_NOTIFICATIONS=true DATA_MODE=mock ACTIVE_ENVIRONMENT=local npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.e2e:prepare: npm run build:frontend:local && npm run r2:sync:local
scripts.test:e2e: npm run e2e:prepare && npx playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:local: npm run build:frontend:local && npm run r2:sync:local && npx playwright test
scripts.setup:e2e: npx playwright install && sudo env "PATH=$PATH" npx playwright install-deps
scripts.deploy:localstack: npm run build:backend:local && cd terraform && terraform apply -auto-approve -var-file=tfvars/localstack.tfvars
